name: Fang Gu
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes a Fang Gu & you become a Peasant & lose this ability.

legacy.otherNightReminder: The Fang Gu points to a player. That player dies. If that player was an Outsider: Replace the Fang Gu with a spare Peasant token. Wake the dead Outsider. Show 'You are' and the Fang Gu token.
